Valid ID Check password validity Your password must contain at least one number and uppercase letter. Must contain at least one special character (~!@#$%^&*_-+=`|:;,.?/). The password cannot contain Korean consonants or vowels. The password must be at least 8 characters and not more than 20 characters in length. Valid PW Confirm name entry The name cannot contain special characters. Please enter 4 digits for the year and 2 digits for the month and day. Birth years range from 1900 to 2023. Month range from 1 to 12. Day range from 1 to 12.
//Feed Page , Welcome! history 3 hours ago Recommended Christmas restaurants! "The end of 2023 is already here!
To celebrate Christmas and the end of the year, we will introduce you a restaurant that are great to visit with your family or loved ones.

" "Blue shore Pasta, 
a steak restaurant in Yeonnam-dong

that is good for a date in Yeonnam-dong. 

Let me introduce you to a steak restaurant in Yeonnam-dong that has a nice atmosphere and tastes good :)

The alley is not crowded
and it is not located in the downtown area,
so it was not difficult to find!

 If you bring your car, there is nothing to worry about.
There is a public parking lot nearby in Yeonnam-dong, so it wouldn't be a bad idea to park there and use it." Steakhouse with a good atmosphere

//Detail Page â€™s blog 2023.12.07 Duckman 5 hours ago "For Christmas, I'm going to share my experience of going to a restaurant where you can't go without waiting~! This time, I went to a restaurant in Seoul!" Introducing the best Makchang restaurant in Seoul~ "Euljiro's Grilled Pork Tail Makchang Restaurant 'Euljiro 1st Mak' in Hipjiro" "Last week, I went to Euljiro 3ga Station and Hipjiro for the first time. I had heard about it from friends, but it was a new world.

" "So a few days later, I convinced my friend to go again. We went to 'Eulji 1st Mak'.

We arrived early so there was no wait, but by the time we ate, there was a wait. Honestly, there were many customers who were a little older than our 20s. They all looked like they were coming after work."
